org.mmtk.plan.nogc

Class NoGC

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mmtk.plan.Plan
      • org.mmtk.plan.nogc.NoGC

  • public class NoGC
extends Plan
    This class implements the global state of a a simple allocator without a collector.

      • getPagesUsed

        public int getPagesUsed()
        Return the number of pages reserved for use given the pending allocation. The superclass accounts for its spaces, we just augment this with the default space's contribution.
        Overrides:
        getPagesUsed in class Plan
        Returns:
        The number of pages reserved given the pending allocation, excluding space reserved for copying.
